evidence.claim: Composure utilizes AWS Lambda for serverless computing functions.
The platform supports FHIR for health data exchange compliance.
Integration with EHRs is possible through HL7 standards implementation.
Uses AWS S3 for scalable storage of health documents.
The architecture employs API Gateway for secure API transactions within applications.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence found indicating usage of X12 formats or EDI in healthcare.
